name: Pioneer Electronic
overview:
We, Pioneer Electronics are an authorized Manufacturer and Supplier, came into existence in the year 1990.

Our Product Range: Sensor Tap, Fly Killer Machine, Electronic Pest Repeller Machine, Electronic Extension, Automatic Water Level Controller, Automatic Light Control Switch and many more.

Infrastructure: We have developed state-of-the-art infrastructure, consists of all amenities that are required to carry out efficient operations. It sprawls across a huge landmass, therefore properly segregated into several other departments such as production, quality control, administrative and others. All departments are well equipped with advanced facilities and sophisticated machinery, which enable us to perform our operations in a better way.

Quality: Our unwavering commitment towards excellence has helped us in supplying best quality range in the market. Our experts start examining quality right from the beginning stage of procuring raw material till the products have been sent for packaging.

Our Team: ing appropriate demands of clients. To boost up our team’s efficiency and knowledge, we organize training sessions for them on timely basis.

Why Us? / Our Strengths: We have placed ourselves in the list of top-notch firms, by endlessly supplying products according to appropriate clients’ demands and preferences. Moreover, we supply products on-time, make transparency while we deal with our clients and follow ethical policies, which make us the most preferred choice of huge clientele.
